downloadTitle: Azure Data Factory V1 to V2 Migration Tool June 2018 (62927)
downloadDescription: The Azure Data Factory V1 to V2 Migration Tool helps convert entities from Version 1 to Version 2.
detailsSection: The Azure Data Factory V1 to V2 Migration Tool helps convert entities from Version 1 to Version 2.
systemRequirementsSection:
Windows 10 , Windows 7 Service Pack 1, Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1, Windows Server 2012, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows Server 2016

Microsoft Integration Runtime (Self-hosted) requires a 64-bit Operating System with .NET Framework 4.6.1 or above. The recommended configuration for the Integration Runtime (Self-hosted) machine is 2 GHz, 4 Core CPU, 8 GB Memory and 80 GB disk.
installInstructionSection: Download and run the AzureDataFactoryMigrationTool.msi (64-bit) to install the Migration Tool on your computer. You may also save AzureDataFactoryMigrationTool.msi to your local disk to install later.
